Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 112th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th due to street blockage near 111th and Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 112th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th due to street blockage near 111th and Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/78th
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express, 26 South Shore Express buses are rerouted SB via South Shore, 76th, Coles and 79th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/78th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express and #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted Southbound  via South Shore, 76th, Coles and 79th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/78th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/78th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Coles and 79th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Coles and 79th due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/78th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
